btn_search: Search by company name, industry or anything
lbl_desc1Search: * Search by company name, industry or anything
lbl_descDashboard: A synopsis of our list of businesses and industries in the area, as well as our success in helping them making their connections.
contentIntro1: “Smart Business Directory” is one of the top mobile apps on Business Connection in Vietnam, enabling investors and business owners to advertise to and connect with prospective partners in the industry.
contentIntro2: The app allows customers to keep all relevant info up-to-date, and interact with other businesses effectively.
